Class Puck

java.lang.Object
Puck
public class Puck extends Object
This is the file which contains the pucks used in the Driver class

    • deflect

      public double[] deflect(Mallet m1, double xs1, double xs2, double ys1, double ys2)
      Method to calculate the physics of the deflection between the Mallet in contact and the Puck
      Parameters:
      m1 - The mallet which is making contact with the puck
      xs1 - The X speed of the puck
      xs2 - The X speed of the Mallet
      ys1 - The y speed of the puck
      ys2 - The y speed of the Mallet
      Returns:
      Returns the final trajectory of the puck (in X and Y direction)
